member.summary: Gets the last export error as a number.

members.member:
Get the last warning, if any.
0 = No warnings
1 = Incomplete Export
2 = Video was transcoded, takes extra time - but is not an error

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.Export.AVIExporter.SetOverlayImage(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Applies an overlay image to the exported video. The positioning and size are relative to the zoomed/cropped exported image (video). The method must be called prior to StartExport. For platform integrations this feature is only supported in combination with method.
member.param: The overlay image to be used. Should be in an alpha-enabled image color format (RGBA or BGRA) to be able to handle (semi-)transparent areas. Any other format will not support transparency.
The vertical position of the overlay image relative to the regular orientation of the output images, supports: Top, Centered and Bottom location - use defined constants.
The horizontal position of the overlay image relative to the regular orientation of the output images, supports: Left, Centered and Right - use defined constants.

Scale factor relative the output image size. The value of 1.0 indicates 100% size, and smaller means that the overlay will cover a smaller area of the image. Larger values will result in that the surplus will be cropped.
Flag indicating whether or not the aspect ratio is taken into account. The value of false will ensure aspect ratio correction, otherwise the overlaying is done directly on a pixel-to-pixel basis.
member.returns: True if successfully set the overlay image, otherwise false.

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.Export.AVIExporter.StartExport(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Exports the currently defined devices as an AVI file. Returns error if already in progress.
member.value: True if export was started. Is finished when Progress >= 100.

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.Export.AVIExporter.StartExport(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{VideoOS.Platform.Data.SequenceAviExportElement})
member.summary: Exports the specified sequences as one sequential AVI file. The sequences will be exported one after another in the order provided - no matter the chronological order of the data within.
member.remarks: The CameraList property is ignored and audio is not supported for this method.
member.param: The list of sequences to export.
member.returns: True if export was started. Is finished when Progress >= 100.

member.name: P:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.Export.AVIExporter.Progress
member.summary: Gets the updated progress in percent
member.value: The percent done. Out of range 0-100 means error. -2 means uninitialized.

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.Export.AVIExporter.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels the current export operation

member.name: P:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.Export.AVIExporter.LastError
member.summary:
Gets the last export error as a number.
0 NO_ERROR_OCCURRED No error occurred.
1 ERROR_OPENING_VIDEO_STREAM Error opening video stream from image server.
2 ERROR_OPENING_AUDIO_STREAM Error opening audio stream from image server.
3 ERROR_INITIALIZING_EXPORT Error initializing export (parameters are wrong).
4 ERROR_STARTING_AVI_ENCODER Error starting AVI encoder.
5 ERROR_GETTING_NEXT_IMAGE_FROM_STREAM Error getting next image from image stream.
6 ERROR_GETTING_AUDIO_FROM_STREAM Error getting audio from audio stream.
7 ERROR_ADDING_IMAGE_TO_AVI_ENCODER Error adding image to AVI encoder.
8 ERROR_ADDING_AUDIO_TO_AVI_ENCODER Error adding audio to AVI encoder.
9 EXPORT_CANCELLED Export has been cancelled.
10 UNKNOWN_ERROR Unknown error. This should never happen.

member.name: P:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.Export.AVIExporter.LastDetailedError
member.summary: Can in some cases provided a more detailed error code, potentially helpful in debugging

member.name: P:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.Export.AVIExporter.LastErrorString
member.summary:
Gets the last export error as a string. The format is the error in text form from the LastError : A detailed error text as described below:
0 DETAILED_ERROR_OK
1 DETAILED_ERROR_EXPORT_CANCELLED
2 DETAILED_ERROR_CANNOT_WRITE_FILE
3 DETAILED_ERROR_CANNOT_OVERWRITE_EXISTING_FILE
4 DETAILED_ERROR_CANNOT_CREATE_DESTINATION_FOLDER
5 DETAILED_ERROR_INVALID_FILE_NAME
6 DETAILED_ERROR_GETTING_VIDEO_FROM_SOURCE
7 DETAILED_ERROR_SETTING_VIDEO_FORMAT
8 DETAILED_ERROR_SETTING_VIDEO_DIMENSIONS
9 DETAILED_ERROR_STARTING_VIDEO_ENCODER
10 DETAILED_ERROR_ENCODING_VIDEO
11 DETAILED_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_FAILURE_DURING_VIDEO_EXPORT
12 DETAILED_ERROR_VIDEO_STREAM_ALREADY_OPEN
13 DETAILED_ERROR_CANNOT_CONNECT_TO_VIDEO_SOURCE
14 DETAILED_ERROR_SETTING_AUDIO_FORMAT
15 DETAILED_ERROR_STARTING_AUDIO_ENCODER
16 DETAILED_ERROR_GETTING_AUDIO_FROM_SOURCE
17 DETAILED_ERROR_ENCODING_AUDIO
18 DETAILED_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_FAILURE_DURING_AUDIO_EXPORT
19 DETAILED_ERROR_AUDIO_STREAM_ALREADY_OPEN
20 DETAILED_ERROR_CANNOT_CONNECT_TO_AUDIO_SOURCE
21 DETAILED_ERROR_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_AUDIO_CHANNELS
22 DETAILED_ERROR_INVALID_AUDIO_SAMPLING_RATE
23 DETAILED_ERROR_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_BITS_PER_AUDIO_SAMPLE
24 DETAILED_ERROR_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_AUDIO_SOURCES
25 DETAILED_ERROR_EXPORT_EXCEEDS_MAXIMUM_AVI_FILE_SIZE
26 DETAILED_ERROR_NO_STREAMS_TO_EXPORT
27 DETAILED_ERROR_ILLEGAL_EXPORT_TIME_INTERVAL
28 DETAILED_ERROR_CANNOT_DETERMINE_VIDEO_FRAME_RATE_AND_DIMENSION
29 DETAILED_ERROR_VIDEO_DIMENSION_NOT_SUPPORTED
30 DETAILED_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_FAILURE

member.summary: Cancels and cleans up the current export operation

member.name: P:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.Export.SDKWAVExporter.LastError
member.summary:
Gets the last export error as a number.
0 NO_ERROR_OCCURRED No error occurred.
1 ERROR_OPENING_VIDEO_STREAM Error opening video stream from image server.
2 ERROR_OPENING_AUDIO_STREAM Error opening audio stream from image server.
3 ERROR_INITIALIZING_EXPORT Error initializing export (parameters are wrong).
4 ERROR_STARTING_AVI_ENCODER Error starting AVI encoder.
5 ERROR_GETTING_NEXT_IMAGE_FROM_STREAM Error getting next image from image stream.
6 ERROR_GETTING_AUDIO_FROM_STREAM Error getting audio from audio stream.
7 ERROR_ADDING_IMAGE_TO_AVI_ENCODER Error adding image to AVI encoder.
8 ERROR_ADDING_AUDIO_TO_AVI_ENCODER Error adding audio to AVI encoder.
9 EXPORT_CANCELLED Export has been cancelled.
10 UNKNOWN_ERROR Unknown error. This should never happen.
